properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Jupiter Inlet to Deerfield Beach FL out 20 NM
properties.headline: Marine Weather Statement issued January 4 at 4:34PM EST by NWS Miami FL
properties.description:
The areas affected include...
Coastal waters from Jupiter Inlet to Juno Beach FL out 20 NM...

At 433 PM EST, Doppler radar indicated a shower, capable of producing
winds to around 30 knots. This shower was located over Juno Beach,
moving northeast at 25 knots.

Locations impacted include...
Riviera Beach, Jupiter, Jupiter Inlet, Jupiter Inlet Colony,
Tequesta, Juno Beach and North Palm Beach.
properties.instruction:
This shower will likely produce winds to around 30 knots, and could
pose a serious hazard for boaters. A special marine warning may
eventually be required for this shower. Boaters should consider
heading for shore before the storm arrives.

Report severe weather to the coast guard or nearest law enforcement
agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service
forecast office.
